rules_text:
Double strike
[i]Swordfaire[/i] – Whenever an equipped creature you control attacks, it gains first strike until end of turn.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Owain, Chosen Blade deals combat damage to a player, create a copy of target equipment you control, except it isn't legendary. You may attach that token to a creature you control.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {W}{U}
